name: subsuburban
description:
A mysterious rumble awakens you in the dead of night.

The weakened floor collapses under your feet, releasing you into the unknown depths below the suburbs.

On what journey will the perculiar ASCII caverns take you?  Well. that's for you to find out.

Controls (all re-bindable in-game)
  • A / D - Move left / right
  • Space / W - Jump
  • Left click - Shoot grappling hook
  • Escape / P - Pause
  • R - Reload level
Other
  • F11 - Toggle fullscreen
Credit

Everything was made by myself in ~9 days for the 45th Godot Wild Jam. Theme: Underground.

Tools used

Aseprite | VSCode | Audacity | Mixcraft 9 | Godot
